select realname,nickname,id,price,quantity,uid,create_time,state,isMySelf from (SELECT b.realname,b.nickname,ut.id,ut.price,ut.quantity,ut.uid,ut.create_time,ut.state,"1" AS isMySelf FROM user_trade ut LEFT JOIN user_info b ON ut.uid = b.uid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ut.state <> '3' and ut.state <>'4' AND ut.uid = #{uid} UNION -- 查询我买别人的订单 SELECT b.realname,b.nickname,a.id,a.price,a.quantity,a.uid,a.create_time,a.state,"0" AS isMySelf FROM user_trade a LEFT JOIN user_info b ON a.uid = b.uid LEFT JOIN user_trade_history uth ON uth.user_trade_id = a.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND uth.purchase_uid = #{uid} AND a.state = '6' ) t where 1 ORDER BY state desc,isMyself desc,price asc limit #{pageNum},#{pageTotal}

select count(*) from ( SELECT b.realname,b.nickname,ut.id,ut.price,ut.quantity,ut.uid,ut.create_time,ut.state,"1" AS isMySelf FROM user_trade ut LEFT JOIN user_info b ON ut.uid = b.uid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ut.state <> '3' and ut.state <>'4' AND ut.uid = #{uid} UNION -- 查询我买别人的订单 SELECT b.realname,b.nickname,a.id,a.price,a.quantity,a.uid,a.create_time,a.state,"0" AS isMySelf FROM user_trade a LEFT JOIN user_info b ON a.uid = b.uid LEFT JOIN user_trade_history uth ON uth.user_trade_id = a.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND uth.purchase_uid = #{uid} AND a.state = '6' ) t where 1 ORDER BY price asc
update user_trade set state = ${state} where id = ${id}
